settings.text:
Since our founding, Pure Ground Ingredients has embarked on a number of worldwide

sustainability projects to bring greater value to the communities and farmers we work with,

while bringing higher-quality ingredients to the marketplace back home. From establishing

new, economically-viable crops for an organic fair-trade growers co-op comprised of 674

families in Nicaragua, to partnering with one of our manufacturers to build a bridge

between communities that flooded in Honduras, to establishing sustainable farming education

and training in Sri Lanka, weâ€™re constantly on the hunt for opportunities to help our

growers and their communities thrive in the face of adversity...which ultimately helps our

manufacturers thrive. We replenish land, invest in communities, develop educational

programs, and do everything we can to support sustainable practices, a healthy planet, and

happy people.
